title: Our Thing with Sammy The Bull - S2 Episode 3: GO KILL SAMMY
description:
Salvatore "Sammy the Bull" Gravano (born March 12, 1945) is an American gangster who became the underboss of the Gambino crime family. This is his story. Directed by James Carroll.

For the next several episodes we rewind a bit and tell the stories of the final years before the hit on Paul. In this episode Sammy finds out that there is a hit on him.
